manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Get Soft, Shiny Hair With Redken All Soft Haircare Replenish Dry Hair With Redken All Soft Haircare Hair feeling dry, dull and brittle? All Soft is the professional solution range to moisturize dry, brittle hair with its argan oil-enriched formula that delivers extended softness. This range moisturizes and nourishes hair deeply, while increasing manageability, suppleness and shine. Moisturize Dry Hair & Boost Shine With Argan Oil Redken's Moisture Complex technology also contains Argan Oil, a plant oil and key ingredient that helps moisturize and condition dry and/or brittle hair. For 15x more conditioning, use All Soft Shampoo, All Soft Conditioner & Moisture Restore Leave-In Treatment as a full system.

Redken All Soft Haircare Moisturize Dry Hair and Restore Shine With Argan Oil-Enriched Formulas Hair feeling dry, dull and brittle? Restore moisture and shine to dry hair with Redken's All Soft Haircare system. Redken All Soft Hair features Redken's Moisture Complex with Argan Oil to detangle, moisturize, soften, and add shine to dry, brittle hair.

Explore The All Soft Range Shampoo Add to Cart Conditioner Add to Cart Heavy Cream Add to Cart Argan Oil Add to Cart Moisture Restore Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.7 out of 5 stars 18,856 4.7 out of 5 stars 18,036 4.7 out of 5 stars 3,877 4.6 out of 5 stars 3,064 4.5 out of 5 stars 783 Price $26.00$26.00 $26.00$26.00 $32.00$32.00 $36.00$36.00 $29.41$29.41 Hair Type Dry, brittle or damaged hair Dry, brittle or damaged hair Dry, brittle or damaged hair Dry, brittle or damaged hair Dry, brittle or damaged hair Description Gently cleanses & softens hair Detangles & softens hair Deep conditioning mask Deep conditioning & suppleness Hydrating leave-in treatment Main Benefits Silky, smooth, and shiny hair Hair manageability and shine Improved manageability & shine Concentrated softness & shine Immediate moisture and shine Key Ingredients Argan Oil Argan Oil Argan Oil Argan Oil and Omega-6 formula Argan Oil and Hyaluronic Acid Moisture Complex % 2% Moisture Complex 5% Moisture Complex 12% Moisture Complex 12% Moisture Complex 5% Moisture Complex Suggested Use Apply a quarter on damp hair Apply to midends after shampoo Leave on 5min and rinse Apply to mid-lenghs & ends Apply to towel-dried hair

Which Redken Range Is Right For You? All Soft Acidic Bonding Concentrate Extreme Hair Type Dry, brittle hair Hair Type All types of damaged hair Hair Type Damaged, distressed hair Best For Moisturizing & nourishing hair Best For Reinforcing hair strength Best For Promoting overall hair health Key Ingredients Argan oil and Moisture Complex Key Ingredients Alpha hydroxy citric acid Key Ingredients Protein and Strength Complex Benefits Softness, suppleness and shine Benefits Smoothness and conditioning Benefits 73% less breakage

Who is All Soft best for? All Soft is best for those who have dry, brittle hair that need moisture and softness. What is the main ingredient in All Soft? All Soft contains Argan Oil as part of a Moisture Complex formula, which is known for promoting moisture and softness. What is the key benefit of All Soft Shampoo? All Soft Shampoo gently cleanses and softens dry, brittle hair What is the full All Soft Regimen? Reden's full All Soft haircare regimen includes: All Soft Shampoo, All Soft Conditioner, All Soft Heavy Cream, All Soft Leave-In and All Soft Argan Oil. Should I use the entire regimen to see results? For best results and 15x more conditioning, use Redken All Soft Shampoo, Conditioner and Leave-In Treatment daily as a full system. Heavy treatment mask can be used weekly in place of conditioner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only product that makes my hair manageable
reviews.reviewText: I have thick coarse wavy and usually dry hair with oily roots. It seemed like the only time my hair felt soft and manageable is when I left the salon, but my salon uses a shampoo which is close to 100$. I couldn't justify that so I looked for something cheaper, and I found this. This shampoo is excellent and I will never switch so long as they make it. It's the only shampoo with a fair price point that leaves my hair feeling soft and tangle free. I used to have a huge issue with there being a "rats nest" at the nape of my neck by the end of the day, this shampoo (and conditioner) have eliminated this problem. I no longer have to rip through my hair multiple times a day with a hairbrush, and it's actually smooth and tangle free. The smell is inoffensive although I prefer something more fragrant. Don't apply to your roots if you are oily, by the next day your roots will be shiny and needing to wash again. I only apply from my neck down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been looking for this shampoo all my life.I have an excessive amount of fine hair, color-treated, that gets very dry at the ends but greasy at the scalp. This shampoo softens and moisturizes my hair without making it oily, and I have been able to go more days between washes than with other shampoos that I have tried. I will be using this forever more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my favorite shampoo
reviews.reviewText: This is hands down my OG favorite shampoo. I have thick, wavy hair and this makes it so soft while at the same time feeling super clean. I use it in conjunction with the conditioner and a couple amika products and my hair is super shiny and healthy. It’s worth the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shampoo/conditioner I’ve EVER used!
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo & conditioner has changed my hair for the better!!! Seriously have never used anything that made my hair feel so clean, silky, and soft. Tip: for best results- wash your hair TWICE with shampoo. Really scrubbing every inch of the scalp. I find that doing it twice helps it feel the most clean. The conditioner is super great as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hair is very soft, works as well as Anti-Frizz on Frizz
reviews.reviewText: Scent : slightly melon/salon like, sweet, does not lingerMakes hair soft: YesMakes hair shiny: ehCompared to RedKen Anti-Frizz:Anti-frizz-i-ness : This worked betterHair softness : This worked betterHair appearance : This worked betterLather: Anti-Frizz is nicerI prefer the scent of the Redken Anti-Frizz personally, though neither smell really lingers after rinsing. But I gotta say this works better. The anti-Frizz was not noticeably more effective with smoothing the frizz and had the weird effect of making my hair look dull, for whatever reason. With this, hair is less dull looking, though neither of them worked the hair miracles their prices might suggest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is one of my favorite shampoo’s a little bit pricey but worth it! I love how it makes my hair soft and manageable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this.
reviews.reviewText: I love this. My scalp is very sensitive and breaks out while using a lot of products out there but this is so good and works for me! It smells descent, Makes my hair feel really soft. It doesn't feel like there's plastic or wax build up on my hair. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Made my hair really soft don’t know if it helped with the brittleness that much but I’ve only used it a couple washes so far
I love how silky and shiny my hair is after using this shampoo! It is great for blondes that have dry, processed hair! Will definitely repurchase!
O shampoo é muito bom, equivalente ao da marca L'oréal Absolut Repair, talvez até melhor. O cabelo fica bem macio.
Nos encanta en casa. Lo usamos todos. Muy hidratante. Este tamaño es ideal porque dura mucho
Bekomme täglich Komplimente für meine Haare und bin jetzt schon seit 5 Jahren treue Nutzerin der Shampoo und Spülung

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very good shampoo for anyone with colour even if your hair is fine like mine, it's not heavy, it doesn't coat your hair and I have used it for years
